member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a class is an AddOn. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory
member.summary: Represents a factory for creating and managing AddOn instances. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.AddOnDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the AddOn base directory of this instance.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new AddOnFactory instance using the specified safe-mode value.
member.param: True to load assemblies safely (loading into memory) or not. False will lock the source files.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.GetAddOnTypes
member.summary: Returns all found types that implement the interface.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.LoadAssemblySafe(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to load any exported types from the specified assembly file name. This method loads the assembly into memory, and does not lock the file.
member.param: The file name of the assembly.
member.exception: is not a valid file name.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.LoadAssembly(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to load any exported types from the specified assembly file name.
member.param: The file path of the assembly.
member.exception: is not a valid file name.
is not a file path to a valid assembly.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.LoadAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Attempts to load any exported types from the supplied assembly.
member.param: The assembly to retrieve types from.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.CreateInstance``1(System.Type)
member.summary: Attempts to create an instance of a supplied type.
member.typeparam: The based type to retrieve.
member.returns: Null if the type cannot be created, else returns an instance of .

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.CreateInstance``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to create an instance of a supplied type from the given assembly name and type.
member.typeparam: The based type to retrieve.
member.param: The assembly name that the type resides in.
member.returns: Null if the type cannot be created, else returns an instance of .

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnFactory.CreateInstance``1(System.String,System.String,System.Exception@)
member.summary: Attempts to create an instance of a supplied type from the given assembly name and type.
member.typeparam: The based type to retrieve.
member.param: The assembly name that the type resides in.
The exception that occurs while creating an instance.
member.returns: Null if the type cannot be created, else returns an instance of .

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnException
member.summary: Represents an error that can occur while loading an AddOn.

member.name: F:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnException.StandardMessage
member.summary: The standard message for an .

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnException.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creats a new instance of the class using the supplied message.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnException.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class using the supplied inner exception.
member.param: The exception used to trigger this exception.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creats a new instance of the class using the supplied message and inner exception.
member.param: The exception used to trigger this exception.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.IAddOn
member.summary: Defines a generalized AddOn that a class implements to extend the usage of a host application.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IAddOn.Name
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the name of the AddOn.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IAddOn.Description
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns a description of the AddOn.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IAddOn.Author
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the author's name.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.IAddOn.Initialize(Abide.AddOnApi.IHost)
member.summary: When implemented, initializes the AddOn instance, and prepares communication with the host application.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.IDebugXboxAddOn`1
member.summary: Defines a generalized Debug Xbox AddOn that a class implements to communcate with a host application. This type of AddOn recieves triggers from the host application when changes are made with a remote debug console.
member.typeparam: The Debug Xbox type to be used by the interface.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IDebugXboxAddOn`1.Xbox
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the Debug Xbox supplied from the instance. This value can be null.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.IDebugXboxAddOn`1.DebugXboxChanged
member.summary: When implemented, will be called by the instance when the Debug Xbox instance is connected or disconnected.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.IHaloAddOn`2
member.summary: Defines a generalized Halo AddOn that a class implements to communcate with a host application. This type of AddOn recieves triggers from the host application when changes are made with a Halo Map.
member.typeparam: The Halo Map type to be used by the interface.
The Object Index Entry type to be used by the interface.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IHaloAddOn`2.Version
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the this Halo AddOn instance is compatible with.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IHaloAddOn`2.SelectedEntry
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the currently selected Halo Object Index Entry supplied from the instance. This value can be null.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IHaloAddOn`2.Map
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the current Halo map instance supplied from the instance. This value should never be null.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.IHaloAddOn`2.OnMapLoad
member.summary: When implemented, will be called by the instance when the Halo Map instance is either loaded, or reloaded.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.IHaloAddOn`2.OnSelectedEntryChanged
member.summary: When implemented, will be called by the instance when the currently selected Halo Object Index Entry is changed.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.IHost
member.summary: Defines a generalized AddOn host that a class implements to communcate with instances.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.IHost.Invoke(System.Delegate)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the host's underlying window handle.
member.param: A delegate that contains a method to be called in the control's thread context.
member.returns: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or null if the delegate has no return value.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.IHost.Request(Abide.AddOnApi.IAddOn,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: When implemented, handles a request from an instance using a specified request string and supplied arguments.
member.param: The instance that sent the request.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnHostEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the AddOn Host communication events.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnHostEventArgs.Host
member.summary: The AddOn host instance.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.AddOnHostEventArgs.#ctor(Abide.AddOnApi.IHost)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the supplied AddOn host.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.IMenuButton`3
member.summary: Defines a generalized menu button AddOn that a class implements to extend the usage of a host application.
member.typeparam: The Halo Map type to be used by the interface.
The Object Index Entry type to be used by the interface.
The Debug Xbox type to be used by the interface.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.IMenuButton`3.Icon
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns an icon for this tool. This value can be null.

member.name: M:Abide.AddOnApi.IMenuButton`3.OnClick
member.summary: When implemented, called by the host instance when the menu button is clicked.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.ITabPage`3
member.summary: Defines a generalized tab page AddOn that a class implements to extend the usage of a host application.
member.typeparam: The Halo Map type to be used by the interface.
The Object Index Entry type to be used by the interface.
The Debug Xbox type to be used by the interface.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.ITabPage`3.UserInterface
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the User Interface control for this tab page.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.ITagFilter
member.summary: Defines a generalized Halo Object Entry tag root filter.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.ITagFilter.Filter
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns an array of structures to filter Object Index Entry tag roots. This value can not be null.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.ITagFilter.ApplyFilter
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns true if the tag filter should be used, otherwise the tag filter will be ignored.

member.name: T:Abide.AddOnApi.ITool`3
member.summary: Defines a generalized tool AddOn that a class implements to extend the usage of a host application.
member.typeparam: The Halo Map type to be used by the interface.
The Object Index Entry type to be used by the interface.
The Debug Xbox type to be used by the interface.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.ITool`3.Icon
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns an icon for this tool. This value can be null.

member.name: P:Abide.AddOnApi.ITool`3.UserInterface
member.summary: When implemented, gets and returns the User Interface control for this tool.
